title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.176 - Dressing rooms and areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.176 - Dressing rooms and areas

State Regulations

In establishments where employees routinely change clothes, rooms or areas are to be designated and used for this purpose. These designated rooms or areas are not to be used for food preparation, storage or service, or for utensil washing or storage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.176

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
